criteria: Unit and Integration test coverage for US-ID-001 and US-ID-002 exceeds 80%. All integration tests for registration and email verification pass.
Mandatory security code reviews (TSK-ID-010, TSK-ID-013) are completed and approved. No high or critical severity findings from SAST scans.
A merge to the main branch results in a successful, automated, zero-touch deployment to the staging EKS cluster.
bypass_criteria: Only for critical hotfix with manual deployment runbook.
